name: 01-Invoice-Extraction

nodes.name: Multi LLM Query
nodes.description: This node is designed to query multiple large language models (LLMs) from different providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini) using a vector database (e.g., Pinecone or FAISS) or a DataFrame. It processes user queries and returns responses by querying the selected vector database.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: task
fields.title: Select Option
fields.description: Specify the task to perform: summary, translation, topic extraction, or other.

optionsMap.translation: Translate the following content to default language
optionsMap.topic_extraction: Extract key topics from the following content.

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
"text": """ Your task is to extract all the invoice information and present this in below json format. All the values are dummy
  {
  "Invoice Date": "2024/06/30",
  "Invoice Number": "AA3170000486",
  "From": {"Company Name": "from Name", "Address": "from Address", "contact": "from contact", "Tax ID": "From Tax ID"},
  "To": {"Company Name": "To Name", "Address": "To Address", "contact": "To contact", "Tax ID": "To Tax ID"},
  "items": [
    {
      "Description": "Warehouse Storage Fee - 1st Period",
      "Quantity": "4",
      "Unit Price": 8,
      "Amount": 14440,
      "Tax Rate": "10%"
    },
    {
      "Description": "Warehouse Storage Fee - 2nd Period",
      "Quantity": "2",
      "Unit Price": 8,
      "Amount": 14440,
      "Tax Rate": "10%"
    },
    {
      "Description": "Warehouse Storage Fee - 3rd Period",
      "Quantity": "5",
      "Unit Price": 8,
      "Amount": 13640,
      "Tax Rate": "10%"
    }
  ],
  "Net Total": 42520,
  "VAT": 4252,
  "Grand Total": 46772,
}


If any value is not there, please make it Null
  
  """
fields.title: Custom Prompt
fields.description: Custom prompt to override the default instructions.

fields.description: Column name for the text content.

fields.title: Language
fields.description: Language for translation (default: 'en').

fields.title: Select Connection

fields.description: Temperature setting for the model (default: 0).

fields.description: Column name for the base 64 image.

fields.description: Select the model to use (text, image, text+image).
